Input.name: customMods
Input.string: Implicits: 0 {variant:1}--- Directionless --- Projectiles have 50% chance to Return to you 50% more Damage Projectiles are fired in random directions {variant:2}--- Sightless --- Base Critical Strike Chance for Attacks with Weapons is 12% {variant:2}You are Blind {variant:3}--- Careless --- Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles {variant:5}--- Lightless --- 5% increased Maximum Life per Abyss Jewel affecting you 5% increased Maximum Mana per Abyss Jewel affecting you
